sen.e: Even if you think nothing of my death, you and me had a longstanding relationship, thus I want you to pray for my soul to God for pity's sake.

sen.j: もし、命が今しばらくあったとしても、今はいっさい昔の身とは思わないと心に堅く決めている。
sen.e: Even if I live for a while, I firmly decided not to think of myself as old self.
If perchance, I should remain in this world for some time to come, I have decided resolutely not to think of myself as the same self I used to be.

sen.j: そのわけは、それが不憫であるとか、名残が惜しい、あの人の事が気がかりなどと考え始めたら、思うだけでもきりがないであろうから。
sen.e: Because it will go on forever if I start to allow self-pity, hate to leave, or worry for someone.

The reason being that whether it be out of self pity, the sorrow of parting, or concern for the wellbeing of someone dear, once I allow myself to indulge such sentimental reminiscence, there will be no end to it.

sen.e: I'm not sure of the strength of my heart and decided to forget everything and not to write to you wherever I will be. So, please do not think like I don't write to you because of neglect.
